properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 12:51PM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 6 to 11 ft.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Cape Hatteras.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
